title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages library, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary()
code: library(libminer) ## basic example code lib_summary() #>                                                                 Library #> 1                                    C:/Program Files/R/R-3.5.3/library #> 2 C:/Users/lmaow/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpwVH6LF/temp_libpath60dc5ee71589 #> 3                   C:/Users/lmaow/OneDrive/Documents/R/win-library/3.5 #>   n_packages #> 1         30 #> 2          1 #> 3        255 ## add sizes lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                 Library #> 1                                    C:/Program Files/R/R-3.5.3/library #> 2 C:/Users/lmaow/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpwVH6LF/temp_libpath60dc5ee71589 #> 3                   C:/Users/lmaow/OneDrive/Documents/R/win-library/3.5 #>   n_packages lib_sizes #> 1         30  77159687 #> 2          1     12555 #> 3        255 882928702

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provide brief summary package libraries machine.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logical value indicating whether calculate sizes. Default FALSE.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. sizes = TRUE, column library sizes added.
